TEXT.TITLE: CIBA-GIEGY IN PACT TO MAKE GALLSTONE DISSOLVER
TEXT.BODY: <Ciba-Giegy Corp>'s Ciba-Giegy Pharmaceuticals division said it had an agreement with <Gipharmex S.P.A.> (Giuliani Group), of Milan, Italy, to develop and eventually market in the U.S. a new gallstone dissolving drug. The company said the drug, ursodeoxycholic acid, is a naturally occurring bile acid and has been approved for marketing in most European countries and in Japan. The division said it holds a patent on the use of the drug to dissolve gallstones. Reuter
